Is it... No wonder there's a lot less noise... I was too concentrated so I forgot about the surroundings..... So we've survived once again?

All right... Unfortunately, putting the power furnace aside, even Hyperion itself cannot perform normally without the replacement parts. We have suffered too much loss in these battles.

わかった……でも、残念なことに動きそうもないの。補充部品がなければ動力炉どころか、ハイペリオン本体も正常に運転できない。ここ数回の戦闘での被害が大きすぎたみたい。

Okay ...... but unfortunately it's not going to work. Without replacement parts, the Hyperion itself cannot operate properly, let alone the power reactor. It seems that the damage from the last few battles was too much.

speaker
portraits
msg
msg

First, we need to find ways to repair Hyperion. Try all possibilities, even if the chances are low. After that, we should put all wounded people in the compartments near the bridge. The defense on left wing compartments is too weak and we have no manpower. Also, we will use the available materials to reinforce defense around the bridge as much as possible to prepare for future battles.
首先，寻找修理休伯利安的方法，哪怕只有一点可能性也要积极尝试。然后，将伤员统一安置到舰桥附近的舱室，左翼舱室的防守太过薄弱，也没有人手抽调。另外，利用战舰上现有的材料最大可能加固舰桥周围的防御工事，准备之后的战斗。
まず、ハイペリオンを修理する方法を探す。僅かな可能性でもあれば試してみること。そして、負傷者を艦橋近くのキャビンに収容する。それから、戦艦にある材料で艦橋周囲の防御を固くして。準備ができたら戦いよ。
먼저, 히페리온을 수리하는 방법을 찾아. 작은 가능성이라도 있다면 시도해 봐. 그리고 부상자를 함교 근처 캐빈에 수용해. 그 다음, 전함에 있는 재료로 함교 주변 방어를 견고하게 만들고. 준비가 끝나면 싸우자.

First, look for ways to repair the Hublian, and actively try even the slightest possibility. Then, place the wounded uniformly in the compartments near the bridge; the defense of the left wing compartment is too weak and there is no manpower to draw. In addition, use the materials available on the battleship to strengthen the fortifications around the bridge to the greatest extent possible, in preparation for the battle afterwards.

First, look for ways to repair Hyperion. If there is even the slightest possibility, try it. Then, take the wounded to a cabin near the bridge. Then, fortify the perimeter of the bridge with materials from the battleship. When you are ready, you are ready to fight.

마지막으로, 가장 중요한 건데, 불을 좇는 나방은 리더 없이는 못해…… 투표로 새로운 지도자를 뽑아야 해.
